author: mzarucki
body:
Added offline DQM code for monitoring of the SoftMuHardJetMET SUSY HLT path:
- Added SoftMuHardJetMETSUSYMonitor configuration files: SoftMuHardJetMETSUSYMonitor_cff.py and SoftMuHardJetMETSUSYMonitor_Client_cff.py
- Modified the SusyMonitoring_cff.py and SusyMonitoring_Client_cff.py to include the module in the sequence
- Modified the TopMonitor plugin (TopMonitor.cc and TopMonitor.h) to allow enabling MET plots if no MET cut is applied
title: Offline DQM code for monitoring of SoftMuHardJetMET SUSY HLT path
